column5: Holy molly. I was sweating like crazy come 9 am on the lake. Water temp jumped from 3.7 C Thursday to 11.7  today . Time for shorts and a t out there . Let the feet dangle in the water too. LOL
You haven’t heard? They’re getting rid of spring. Cost cutting.
Supposed to be 30 come Tuesday...literally woke up to this 10 days ago?
I just came in from cutting grass for an hour and said to my wife that we seem to have jumped from a cold wet spring to mid-July in a few days  LOL
The only good thing I can think of is the heat normally kills off the blackflies.  The bad thing, the heat and rain will hatch the mosquitos.
I'd like spring please.  Not ready for mid to high 20 degree temps just yet.
I would take spring all year long. I hate the heat of summer
It seems like I woke up one day and there are leaves on the maple trees and green buds on the rest. Gardens pop up over night too.
